com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Interface StepFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultStepFactory

    public interface StepFactory
    An implementation of this interface should provide Steps based on TaskSpecs. This should include logic detecting that a previously launched Task's specification has changed and so a relaunch of the Task is needed. In this case the Step should be initialized with the new OfferRequirement and be set to Pending. Conversely, an implementation of this interface should return Steps with a Complete status when no TaskSpecification change is detected for a Task.
